section.name: Versioning
section.span: What is versioning to a content contributor?
section.p: Versioning allows you to browse the history of a document, i.e. to see the changes to the document over time and allows you to restore a previous version of the document, to replace the current content of a document with content the document had sometime in the past.

Versioning requires that copies of your document are saved for later history browsing and restoring. This is done automatically by Hippo CMS, but at what occasions the copies are automatically made is a business rule decided by your organization. Who will know and how to find out what the business rule actually is?
